item.description:
Hi Guys, this was relayed by Dave, seems like a good activity until the snow flies...After, it's at one of our very own favorite local XC places!

cheers,

Mike

 

Thomas Chamberas 6K XC Race Folks, this is just an invite to kick your XC running season off at this fun event. We've been putting it on for 10 years and it's a fun yet challenging XC course at a familiar spot--the Great Brook Ski Touring Center. 

It's Aug. 25 and all the details are here: 
http://www.thomasxc.org

Any questions, let me know! 

Dave

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Pre XC Season Road Race
